sentence.text: Cyclooxygenase (generation of precursor metabolites and energy)-2 is upregulated in hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation).

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy

sentence.text: Reduced representation bisulfite sequencing (RRBS) and gene expression microarrays were performed in the phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation tumor and non-HCC liver tissues to investigate the molecular mechanisms of generation of precursor metabolites and energy-2-driven HCC.

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy

sentence.text: Bio-functional investigation revealed that sequestering of TGFbeta in extracellular matrix inhibited cell proliferation in phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation cell lines, suggesting its potential role as a tumor suppressor in HCC.

entity.text: sequestering of TGFbeta in extracellular matrix

sentence.text: In conclusion, this study demonstrated for the first time that enhanced generation of precursor metabolites and energy-2 expression in hepatocytes is sufficient to induce phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation through inducing promoter hypermethylation by reducing positive regulation of cell proliferation, silencing tumor-suppressive genes and activating key oncogenic pathways.

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy
